scripts.start: watchify src/index.js -o static/bundle.js -dv -p livereactload -u react-native -x react -x react-dom -x ksana-corpus-lib
scripts.build: browserify src/index.js -g [envify --NODE_ENV 'production'] -t [ babelify --presets es2015 ] -x ksana-corpus -x ksana-corpus-rom -x ksana-corpus-search -x ksana-corpus-builder -x ksana-corpus-lib -u react-native -x react -x react-dom  > static/bundle.js
scripts.debugbuild: browserify src/index.js -t [ babelify --presets es2015 ]  -x ksana-corpus -x ksana-corpus-rom -x ksana-corpus-search -x ksana-corpus-builder  -u react-native -x react -x react-dom  > static/bundle.js
